saying: A friend in need is a friend indeed!
description: Patty is a peppy, cow villager who has appeared in every Animal Crossing series game. Her name either relates to a "beef patty" or "cow pat" (another name for cow dung). Her Japanese name is likely from the milk-based soft drink Calpis. Her catchphrase is based on "How Now Brown Cow," a phrase that helps children learn rounded vowel sounds and is also a greeting.
